definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: The deformation and the spreading curve of the work piece were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 同時分析了軋件的變形情況以及寬展曲線等。

sentences.english: I am not well-off either. You'd better borrow money from Laoli, who is comfortably off .
sentences.chinese: 我也不富裕，你還是去家境寬展的老李那兒借錢吧。

sentences.english: If no application has been filed at the expiration of the grace period, the registered trademark shall be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 寬展期滿仍未提出申請的，註銷其註冊商標。

sentences.english: The design method of the groove is presented here in the article.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了三輥減徑機寬展孔型的設計方法。

sentences.english: The first pass width of stainless steel wire flattening rolling can be calculated by E.
sentences.chinese: 鋼絲壓扁過程中的第一道次寬展量可用E。
